cleaned_text: Dr. Kaushik's Ayurvedic and Naturopathic Clinic 792 Route 35 Yellow Monkey Village Cross River, NY 10518 Yellow Monkey Village Cross River, NY 10518 AYURVEDA Combination of Ayurveda and Naturopathy is used to create a unique treatment plan to regain and maintain health. Based on one's particular body constitution (dosha), a plan may include supplements, diet/nutrition suggestions, lifestyle management, detoxification, hydrotherapy, 0zone therapy, Panchakarma.
